import React from "react"; import "../Component/LearnInfo.css"; const LearnInfo = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Explore actionable insights to reduce carbon emissions

Unlock valuable knowledge on reducing carbon emissions and embracing sustainable practices. This section offers expert insights, practical steps, and the latest innovations to help you minimize your environmental impact.

{/* Cards Section */}

Explore Insights

{/* Card 1 */}

Switch to Renewable Energy

Solar and wind power can significantly reduce your carbon footprint. Explore how you can transition to renewable energy today!

Learn More
{/* Card 2 */}

Sustainable Agriculture

Sustainable farming techniques promote soil health while reducing emissions. Find out how you can support eco-friendly agriculture.

Learn More
{/* Card 1 */}

Switch to Renewable Energy

Solar and wind power can significantly reduce your carbon footprint. Explore how you can transition to renewable energy today!

{/* Card 2 */}

Sustainable Agriculture

Sustainable farming techniques promote soil health while reducing emissions. Find out how you can support eco-friendly agriculture.

Learn More
{/* Carbon Bulletin */}

THE CARBON BULLETIN

{[ { title: "Global Emission Trends", description: "Tracking the latest data and reports on carbon emissions worldwide.", imgSrc: "images/images/.jpeg", link: "", }, { title: "Policy Shifts for Sustainability", description: "Updates on government policies and their impact on carbon emissions.", imgSrc: "images/images/news2.jpeg", link: "https://www.ey.com/en_in/insights/government-public-sector/six-ways-that-governments-can-drive-the-green-transition", }, { title: "Industry Transformation Stories", description: "How major industries are embracing green practices and lowering emissions.", imgSrc: "images/images/news3.jpeg", link: "https://media.inti.asia/read/green-industrial-transformation-addressing-climate-change-and-global-warming", }, ].map((news, index) => (

{news.title}

{news.description}

))}
); }; export default LearnInfo;
